main.sql:
select cast(Transliter(fr.fio) as varchar(50)) as EngFio , cast(Transliter(fr.town) as varchar(103))as engTown , cast(Transliter(fr.Coach) as varchar(50))as engCoach , (c.date_begin - fr.bithdate)/365 as age , fr.* , r.sname as rname , loc.zr , loc.edittime , loc.createtime , loc.id_stream , r.sname as rusDivisionName , trnsl.val as engDivisionName
from finalreport(%IDC%) fr inner join Lifter_on_competition loc on loc.id_lifter_compet = fr.loc inner join Competit C on c.id_compet = loc.id_compet inner join range r on r.id_range = c.id_range left join translate_rus_eng trnsl on trnsl.id = 'RANGE_SNAME_'||r.id_range
%WHERE%
order by fr.sex, fr.fio
